Articles.Content:
Who are you?

The user below me has blown up KSP. I mean the game itself, not anything in the game

Uh, sort of. It's has crashed many times.

I have a pile of these from the last few versions.

The use below has more crash reports lying around than me.

Nope. Surprisingly, none are left laying around at all.

The user below me is alive.

True (what a suprise)

The user below me likes spaghetti

I hope she makes lotsa spaghetti!

(Yes)

The user below me has a light.

I have many lights. If you're referring to a cigarette lighter, then no. If instead you meant a match, then I have many. If you meant a torch, I also have several.

The user below me will refrain from being so ambiguous

i'm not sure.... will i?

user below has a colorful avatar (but not as colorful as mine)

false... mine is a pony you argument is invalid...

the user below me agrees...

nope.

User below has a smart retort...

"O the indignity", so true

The user below knows where this quote is from.

false

the user below me has never been attacked by the kraken

False several times ,and a surprise visit to jool.

The user below has watched the new Thomas series?

false

the user below me can't wait for P-day

true ,but I say this not really knowing what this ,but have a twitchy leg that i might know what that is.

The user below me had owned Thomas the tank engine toys in there childhood.

true...I still have them... (pony day)

the user below me understands...

know I do ,and Let me get some pillows.

The user below me has read one of the Thomas the tank engine books.(pre-TV series)

yeah, i have.

user below is NOT a panda.

True

user below me likes mine turtles.

Unsure.

The user below me is afraid of heights (acrophobic).

yup, matter fact so bad i get very sick if i look down or look out windows in very high alt.

User below knows how to make a oscillating steam engine.

kind of, it's that spinning thing right?

User below is a kerbal.

False. I am the Shadow of the Night, Lord of the Seventh Realm.

User below is a minion.

False, the things I have.. They have Minions!

The next user to post is one of my 'things'

I don't follow, so false

(120% Cooler avatar!)

The user below me gets that yoke.

Nope. Sorry to disappoint.

The user below is terrified of my avatar.
